meanings.sent1: The storm grew damneder as the winds howled louder.
meanings.sent2: The coffee tasted damneder with each sip.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked damneder than usual with its fur all puffed up.
meanings.sent4: The situation became damneder as more complications arose.
meanings.sent5: The darkness of the cave seemed damneder than anything he had ever experienced.

meanings.sent1: Her headache felt damneder as the day went on.
meanings.sent2: The old house appeared damneder in the moonlight.
meanings.sent3: The kids' excuses for not doing homework were getting damneder by the minute.
meanings.sent4: The silence in the room grew damneder with each passing second.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the medicine was damneder than she had anticipated.

meanings.sent1: The mystery of the missing keys became damneder as they searched every room.
meanings.sent2: The teacher's disappointment grew damneder when no one completed the assignment.
meanings.sent3: The traffic jam seemed damneder than usual on a Friday evening.
meanings.sent4: The tension in the room was damneder than a coiled spring.
meanings.sent5: The fear in his eyes was damneder than she had ever seen before.
